content.raw:
Ah yeah, I changed to # and then back to Num, the gif is a bit old. Sorry about that, I was trying to make it shorter but I thought # wasn't clear enough. We can revisit this in the future, add tooltips and things like that.

Are there any other inconsistencies? I was mostly worried about how this plays with your plotting, not sure if I broke the drag and drop
